segments.text: Look at those kids trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that wobbly stool, stretching up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's right there, waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, the mom doesn't even know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just drying dishes by the sink, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out everywhere, making a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the kids are having fun, that's what matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks pretty through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet those cookies taste great right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool might fall, but they're quick little ones.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just too cute to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they share with each other.
segments.speaker: PAR
